sourcesContent:
import { memo, useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import City from '../../Data/city.json' import axios from "axios"; import LoadingDialog from "../../Layout/LoadingDialog"; import Bg from '../../images/bgHome.jpg' import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { english, vietnamese } from "../../Languages/RegisterProfilePartner"; import { english as englishDetailPartner, vietnamese as vietnameseDetailPartner, englishService, vietnameseService } from "../../Languages/ViewInformationDetailPartner" import './ViewInformationDetailPartner.scss' import { API_GET_DETAIL_PARTNER, API_GET_SERVICE_BY_CONDITION } from '../../API'; function ViewInformationDetailPartner({ languageSelected }) { const navigate = useNavigate() const languageList = languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese const languageMore = languageSelected === 'EN' ? englishDetailPartner : vietnameseDetailPartner const languageService = languageSelected === 'EN' ? englishService : vietnameseService const [optionSelected, setOptionSelected] = useState(0) const [getDataComplete, setGetDataComplete] = useState(false) const [partner, setPartner] = useState(useLocation().state.id) //nếu có 2 api riêng thì tách 2 biến như này const [listService, setListService] = useState([]) const getListServiceByAccountId = () => { } useEffect(() => { axios.get(API_GET_SERVICE_BY_CONDITION, { params: { emailPartner: partner.email } }).then((res) => { const data = res.data.data let servicesRaw = [] data.map((service) => { const serviceItem = { id: service.serviceId, name: service.serviceName, category: parseInt(service.serviceCategory), type: "1" } servicesRaw.push(serviceItem) }) setListService([...servicesRaw]) setGetDataComplete(true) }).catch((e) => { setGetDataComplete(true) }) }, []) return (
setOptionSelected(0)} className={`item-nav-view-service-admin ${optionSelected == 0 ? 'item-nav-view-service-admin-selected' : 'item-nav-view-service-admin-unselected'} br-left-top`}> {languageMore.txtDetails}
setOptionSelected(1)} className={`item-nav-view-service-admin ${optionSelected == 1 ? 'item-nav-view-service-admin-selected' : 'item-nav-view-service-admin-unselected'} br-right-top`}> {languageMore.txtListService}
{optionSelected === 0 ?
: <> {optionSelected === 1 ?
{listService.map((service) => (
navigate(`/admin/view-service?serviceId=${service.id}`)}>{languageMore.txtSeeDetail}
))}
:
} }
) } export default memo(ViewInformationDetailPartner)
